Package jcckit.renderer

Renderer classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Graphics2DRenderer Renderer who draws the GraphicalElements into a java.awt.Graphics2D context.
GraphicsRenderer Renderer who draws the GraphicalElements into a java.awt.Graphics context.
SVGRenderer Renderer creating Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) from GraphicalElements.
Transformation Transformation between device-independent coordinates and standard Java coordinates.

Renderer classes.
